Package ACO

Class AntColony

java.lang.Object
ACO.AntColony
All Implemented Interfaces:
AntColonyInterface
public class AntColony extends Object implements AntColonyInterface
Class that represents the ant colony Implements the AntColonyInterface

  • Constructor Details

    • AntColony

      public AntColony(GrafoInterface Graph, int nest_node, float alpha, float beta, float gamma, int ant_colony_size, float ro)
      Parameters:
      Graph - - graph to be used
      nest_node - - node to be used as nest
      alpha - - value for calculating the probability of choosing a node
      beta - - value for calculating the probability of choosing a node
      gamma - - value for calculating the level of pheromone
      ant_colony_size - - number of ants in the colony
      ro - - value for decreasing pheromones
